entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't get SignalR to work behind AWS ALB #39736
  • Automatic type inference won't work when an EventCallBack<T> is added #39734
  • Failed assert for m_disconnect_cts->reset() in connection_impl::start #39730
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [6.0.x] Port fix for https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/39526 to .NET 6 #39729
  • Publish test results for Blazor JS tests #39727
  • Blazor server Safari fullscreen issue #39726
  • Information in the JwtBearer comments is not up-to-date #39725
  • Support for a standard router in the new one or extension of the current one with additional parameters. #39719
    Discussions
  • With .NET 7.0 SDK, I cannot create .NET 6.0 web project, the target net6.0 can't be found. #39731

Closed

  • Can't use hotReloadProfile with additional arguments #39739
  • [Question] :Is MAUI.NET blazor shipped with a browser like electron? #39673
  • .Net6 Blazor SignalR Hub Connection causing high CPU in web browser #39482
  • gRPC H3 benchmarks broken #39549
  • EditContext.Validate() always true when using it without EditForm component #39717
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix #39593
  • SignalR TypeScript Client - The next event handler is not called if the previous event handler removes itself #39512
    7.0-preview2
  • Using CascadingValue causes to set out-dated value to child component #39699
  • Blazor Virtualize - Calls ItemsProvider with request.Count = 0 when not visible #39723
  • Create BlazorWebAssemblyApp 5.0/3.1 project in M1 machine and use the command "dotnet run", meet error:"Unhandled exception". #39397
  • Update Razor compiler to use global:: more liberally #18757
    7.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Don't reference test asset projects in Build.props #39733
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/5.0] Improve File access issues #39732
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • .ConfigureAwait(false) in SignalR client libraries #39728
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Use SHA256.HashData(Stream) one-shot #39738
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix obsolete method on EnableDataAnnotationsValidation #39737
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Update to SDK 7.0.100-alpha.1.22071.3 #39735
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fixed typo in "systemd" #39714
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • !fixup! Use non-`-Svc` pool #39695
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix: The next event handler is not called if the previous event handler removes itself #39716
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4e9fe30` to `3d81736` #39720
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `a50a863` to `645b03f` #39721
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Spelling correction: Anuglar->Angular #39710
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Refactor (WebJS) - Fix some ESLint warnings #39700
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Move some targets into a Directory.Build.targets file #39712
    area-runtime
  • Add support for DI in Hub methods #34047
    area-signalr
  • Added more stream result types #39709
    area-runtime
  • Removing from API Description parameters when inferred (FromPath) and not in the route #39607
    area-mvc
  • [Backport] Fix browser cookie tests to only run with HTTPS #39679
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Support Custom Classes for ValidationMessage #38639
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add dark mode for developer exception page #39676
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Do not merge] ARM64 PR copy #39678
    area-runtime
  • Do not assume that `this._settings.loginMode` is not `undefined`. #35245
    area-blazor
  • Add format analyzer for `BindAsync` and `TryParse` custom bindings #37002
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update code docs for DynamicRouteValueTransformer #36653
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Blazor Server - Auto reconnect on mobile browsers #32122
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Update Http1Connection.cs #39718
    area-runtime
